form.label: Zeek SSH (v1.0)
form.description: V1 Additions: First generation of dashboard

search.query: index= sourcetype="zeek:ssh:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | stats count by client, id.orig_h, id.resp_h | where !like (client, "-") AND !like (client, "%SSH%") | rename client AS "Client", id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination | sort -count

index= sourcetype="zeek:ssh:json" NOT id.resp_p = "22" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | fillnull value="-" client, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, server | stats count by client, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, server | rename id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination, id.resp_p AS Port, server AS Server, client AS Client | sort -count

index= sourcetype="zeek:ssh:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | fillnull client, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, server | stats count by client, id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, server | rex field=id.orig_h "(?<orig_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval orig_subnet=orig_subnet + ".0.0/16" | rex field=id.resp_h "(?<resp_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval resp_subnet=resp_subnet + ".0.0/16" | where !like (client, "-") | stats count by orig_subnet, resp_subnet | sort -count | rename orig_subnet AS "Source Subnet", resp_subnet AS "Destination Subnet"
